name: ai-paper-reviewer
description: Intelligent submission analysis with expandable review details, re-review capability, and criteria-based scoring
author: CFP Directory

actions.name: list-models
actions.title: List Available Models
actions.description: Fetches available models from the configured AI provider

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Fine-tune technical parameters (most users can ignore this)

aiProvider.title: AI Provider
aiProvider.x-friendly-hint: All three providers produce high-quality reviews. Choose based on your existing subscriptions.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your API key from the selected provider
apiKey.x-friendly-hint: Get this from your provider's dashboard (OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google Cloud). Stored securely and never shared.

model.title: Model
model.x-friendly-hint: Available models load from your provider. Recommended models are marked.

strictnessLevel.title: Review Strictness
strictnessLevel.description: How critical should the AI be?
strictnessLevel.x-friendly-hint: Lenient: Encouraging and supportive. Moderate: Balanced feedback. Strict: High standards, detailed critiques.

useEventCriteria.title: Use Event's Review Criteria
useEventCriteria.description: Match reviews to your event's specific scoring criteria
useEventCriteria.x-friendly-hint: When enabled, reviews follow the criteria you've set up for your event. Highly recommended.

autoReview.title: Auto-Review New Submissions
autoReview.description: Automatically review submissions when they come in
autoReview.x-friendly-hint: Enable for hands-off operation. Disable to manually trigger reviews from the dashboard.

enableDuplicateDetection.title: Detect Similar Submissions
enableDuplicateDetection.description: Flag potential duplicate or overlapping submissions
enableDuplicateDetection.x-friendly-hint: Helps identify when multiple submissions cover the same topic.

duplicateThreshold.title: Similarity Threshold
duplicateThreshold.description: How similar submissions need to be before flagging (0.5-0.95)
duplicateThreshold.x-friendly-hint: Lower = more flags (may include false positives). Higher = only very similar submissions.

showAiReviewerOnTeamPage.title: Show AI Reviewer Publicly
showAiReviewerOnTeamPage.description: List the AI reviewer on your public team page
showAiReviewerOnTeamPage.x-friendly-hint: Enable if you want speakers to know AI is part of your review process.

temperature.title: Response Variability
temperature.description: How varied the AI's responses should be (0 = consistent, 1 = creative)
temperature.x-friendly-hint: Default (0.3) produces reliable, consistent reviews. Increase for more varied feedback.

confidenceThreshold.title: Confidence Threshold
confidenceThreshold.description: Flag reviews when AI confidence is below this level
confidenceThreshold.x-friendly-hint: Low-confidence reviews are shown with a warning. Increase to be more selective.

reReviewCooldownMinutes.title: Re-review Cooldown (minutes)
reReviewCooldownMinutes.description: Wait time before auto-reviewing an edited submission
reReviewCooldownMinutes.x-friendly-hint: Prevents excessive API calls when authors make rapid edits.
